---

EvoLite is an open-source Python library designed to optimize and compress neural networks seamlessly.

## Table of Contents

- [Installation](#installation)
- [Usage](#usage)
- [Contributing](#contributing)
- [License](#license)

## Installation

```console
pip install evolite
```

## Usage

```python
import evolite

```
